messages.subject: Holiday time
messages.msgSnippet: Well, with the onset of the holidays, home hunting and extra children at my home, I am decreasing my online time. I am going no mail for the duration. I do not
messages.messageBody:
Well, with the onset of the holidays, home hunting and extra children at my
home, I am decreasing my online time. I am going no mail for the duration. I
do not think it is wise to have two ADHD people in the house with me hiding
in the classroom. :(
I am still able to be reached via email (Lifeslearn@...) or ICQ 43428000
Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays Everyone!
(I just saw my husband do flips in anticipation of serious computer down
time! LOL)
See ya'll after the new year! Good luck with Y2K!

May the love of God surround you this season!
Blessings,
Stephanie���
Gift of Strangers - a stranger is a friend
you have yet to meet.
How many strangers have you befriended today?
